titleStmt.title: Master St. John his speech in Parliament on Munday the 17th of January concerning the charge of treason then exhibited to the bishops, formerly accused by the House of Commons, Anno Domini, 1641.

titleStmt.author: St. John, Oliver, 1598?-1673.
